titleStmt.title: The tryal of witchcraft: or, Witchcraft arraign'd and condemn'd. In some answers to a few questions anent witches and witchcraft. Wherein is shewed, how to know if one be a witch, as also when one is bewitched: with some observations upon the witches mark, their compact with the Devil, the white witches &c.
titleStmt.author: Bell, John, fl. 1697.

titleStmt.title: The tryal of witchcraft: or, Witchcraft arraign'd and condemn'd. In some answers to a few questions anent witches and witchcraft. Wherein is shewed, how to know if one be a witch, as also when one is bewitched: with some observations upon the witches mark, their compact with the Devil, the white witches &c.
